forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city emerges under a mostly sunny sky, the air crisp with a gentle breeze whispering from the west. The temperature hints at a cool day ahead, settling at a comfortable 59 degrees, ideal for those who appreciate the invigorating freshness that spring brings. The wind dances lightly, carrying the promise of clear skies and perhaps the fleeting presence of the marine layer, which typically lingers just beyond the golden embrace of the Golden Gate. 

The vistas today appear more inviting than usual, devoid of the fog that frequently veils the iconic bridge. Instead, a palette of soft blues and whites adorns the horizon, creating a serene backdrop for urban wanderers. It is a perfect moment to layer lightly—perhaps a cozy sweater or a light jacket—to shield against the occasional chill as temperatures dip into the evening. 

Today invites a leisurely stroll through the neighborhoods, perhaps a stop at the bustling Ferry Building Marketplace, where you can savor local flavors while soaking in the vibrant spirit of the city. Alternatively, a jaunt along the Embarcadero promises picturesque views that sparkle in the sunlight, a pleasant reminder of why this city enchants so many. Embrace this day with open arms, for it offers the kind of restorative charm that makes each moment feel effortlessly delightful.
